articles.content: Microsoft, after months of rumours and leaks, raised the prices of its Xbox Live Gold recently. While it didnt affect the existing 12-month and 6-month users by a lot, it did have a severe impact on … [+1587 chars]

articles.title: Motorola Edge S pre-orders begin in China ahead of launch - India Today
articles.description: Motorola has been rumored to launch a smartphone with the latest Snapdragon 800-series processor for the longest time.
articles.content: Motorola Edge S is all set to launch in China on January 26. The company has been rumored to launch a smartphone with the latest Snapdragon 800-series processor for the longest time. However, Motorol… [+2040 chars]
